nodes.text: Prime Coromon was an island that formed part of the Coromon Islands, an island chain located on the planet Fresia. During the Galactic Civil War, the island was occupied by the Incom Corporation, which operated a number of manufacturing plants on the island that were originally used to produce T-65 X-wing starfighters. The plants were later refitted and used to build I-7 Howlrunners.
